trans-unit.source: Represents a rule that checks for errors that are raised by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IDataErrorInfo"></xref> implementation of the source object.
trans-unit.target: 에 의해 발생 하는 오류를 검사 하는 규칙을 나타냅니다는 <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IDataErrorInfo"> </xref> 소스 개체의 구현입니다.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] data binding model enables you to associate <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidationRules%2A> with a <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> object.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 데이터 바인딩 모델을 사용 하면 연결할 수 <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidationRules%2A>와 <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>개체입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> </xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidationRules%2A>

trans-unit.source: If your source object implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IDataErrorInfo> interface, you can use the built-in rule DataErrorValidationRule to check for errors raised by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IDataErrorInfo> implementation.
trans-unit.target: 원본 개체를 구현 하는 경우는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.IDataErrorInfo>인터페이스에 의해 발생 한 오류를 확인 하려면 DataErrorValidationRule 기본 제공 규칙을 사용할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.IDataErrorInfo>구현.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IDataErrorInfo> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IDataErrorInfo>

trans-unit.source: An alternative syntax to setting the DataErrorValidationRule explicitly is to set the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidatesOnDataErrors%2A> property to `true` on your <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> or <xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding> object.
trans-unit.target: 설정 하는 것은 DataErrorValidationRule을 명시적으로 설정 하는 대체 구문은 <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidatesOnDataErrors%2A>속성을 `true` 에 프로그램 <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>또는 <xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding>개체입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> </xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidatesOnDataErrors%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can create a custom rule by creating a class that derives from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule> 에서 파생 되는 클래스를 만들어 사용자 지정 규칙을 만들 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information and a detailed discussion of data validation, see [Data Binding Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용 및 데이터 유효성 검사에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 [데이터 바인딩 개요](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: DataErrorValidationRule is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataErrorValidationRule"></xref> class.
DataErrorValidationRule is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
Performs validation checks on a value.
Validate is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: 유효성 검사는.NET Framework 버전 3.5에서에서 도입 되었습니다.

trans-unit.source: The culture to use in this rule.
